Literature.Title: Ultra-short lipopeptides against gram-positive bacteria while alleviating antimicrobial resistance.
Literature.Author: Zhong C, Zhang F, Zhu N, Zhu Y, Yao J, Gou S, Xie J, Ni J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=128µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus 75(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus 113(MIC=128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>128µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>128µM)
